work.title: Am I Rent Stabilized?
work.description: A civic web app to inform NYC renters about rent stabilization.

work.title: Bushwick Community Map
work.description: A map to track issues around urban development in Bushwick, NY

work.title: Greenpoint Williamsburg Toxicity Map
work.description: A map to inform residents of north Brooklyn about environmental hazards.

work.title: A Thru-Hike on the Pacific Crest Trail
work.description: A web project documenting my brother's experience thru-hiking the PCT.

work.title: Guess That Hood NYC!
work.description: A game that allows users to guess neighborhood names in NYC.

work.title: Landscapes of Profit
work.description: An analysis of property transaction data to promote a 1% flip tax in NYC.

work.title: Visualizing CO2 and GNI
work.description: An interactive Processing sketch that visualizes data relating to climate change from the World Bank Data Indicators.

work.title: Prospect Park non-euclidean map
work.description: A non-euclidean map of Prospect Park, Brooklyn

work.title: Graffiti, Rat Sightings, & Wifi Hotspots
work.description: Graffiti, rat sightings, and wi-fi hotspots from NYC open-data.

work.title: From Coast to Coast
work.description: Visualizing my move from the SF Bay Area to NYC with D3JS.

work.title: Oakland: Then and Now - Coastal Grasslands
work.description: Historic coastal grassland, bay and shoreline over the current day built up land area of Oakland, CA.
work.description_long: A prototype map design for the Oakland Museum of California. This map shows historic coastal grassland areas, and a historic bay and shoreline over the current day built up land area for an exhibit titled Oakland: Then and Now.

work.title: Oakland: Then and Now - Oak Woodland
work.description: Historic oak woodland, bay and shoreline over the current day built up land area of Oakland, CA.
work.description_long: A prototype map design for the Oakland Museum of California. This map shows historic oak woodland areas, and a historic bay and shoreline over the current day built up land area for an exhibit titled Oakland: Then and Now.

work.title: Chinook Recovery Priority Watersheds
work.description: Coastal recovery watersheds for Salmon and Steelhead in California
work.description_long: This map was created at GreenInfo Network with Alexandra Barnish, and is a working draft showing only the coastal recovery watersheds for Salmon and Steelhead in California. Central valley recovery watersheds are not shown on this version of the map. For the most recent version please visit Sustainable Conservation's Partners in Restoration program.

work.title: CA Private Public Land
work.description: Private and publically owned land in California.
work.description_long: This map was created at GreenInfo Network with Alexandra Barnish for Sustainable Conservation's Partners in Restoration program.

work.title: Ontario
work.description: The province of Ontario, Canada.
work.description_long: A map of the province of Ontario, Canada created using Natural Earth 1:10m vector GIS data for the *Moon: Ontario* travel guide from Avalon Travel Publishing

work.title: Galapagos Islands
work.description: A map showing the Galapagos Islands

work.title: Afghanistan and Pakistan
work.description: Map of Afghanistan and Pakistan for the book Dirty Wars.
work.description_long: Map of Afghanistan and Pakistan for the book Dirty Wars: The World is a Battlefield, by Jeremy Scahill. Published by Nation Books.

work.title: South East Asia
work.description: A map of Thailand, Laos, and Cambodia.
work.description_long: Another map for a 9 book series on the backpacking trips taken by globetrotter David Koester. Natural Earth vector and relief data were employed for sound cartographic design.

work.title: The North Coast
work.description: A split frame map I created for *Moon: Northern California.*
work.description_long: A split frame map I created for Moon: Northern California. Open data from Cal Atlas and CPAD were used to make this map.

work.title: Downtown Toronto
work.description: A map of downtown Toronto, Canada.

work.title: Downtown Guanajuato
work.description: A map of downtown Guanajuato, Mexico.
